column4: Hi, Do I need the alternate install CD to install 'without' gnome/kde/ ?
why not just install ubuntu-server without any of the server options, w/the linux-generic package, it's exactly what your talking about
the server is the same install without the desktop?
afroken, only difference b/w server and desktop is, A) the lack of ubuntu-desktop on one and B) the addition of linux-server on the other
